screens.other

Class Screen

  • java.lang.Object
    • screens.other.Screen
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChooseDifficulty, ChooseHero, ConfirmQuit, Credits, DeathMenu, GameScreen, Pause, Rules, Settings, Shop, StartScreen, VictoryScreen

    public abstract class Screen
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to create screens that are essential to game
    Author:
    Rithvik

        public void hover(java.awt.Rectangle rect,
                  processing.core.PShape shape,
                  int color1,
                  int color2)
        Creates a hover effect when user's mouse is over a button
        Parameters:
        rect - represents the button in question
        shape - represents the button itself
        color1 - the color of the button when the user's mouse is not over the button
        color2 - the color of the button when the user's mouse is over the button
